Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Vase of the ''flower pot'' type, with a flat circular base pierced by a hole 3,5 cm in diametre. The walls are flared and the lip is rounded. Throwing marks are extremely noticeable and some wear marks are also visible.
